Label: Citizenship
Description: Country for which a migrant is a passport holder

Label: Country of residence
Description: Country of last or next residence

Label: Revision
Description: Indicator for whether the original value has been revised and the cause of revision

Label: Age
Description: Age group, with older age groups split to reflect traditional UK retirement age for women/men

Label: Area of Destination or Origin
Description: Area of destination or origin of migration
